title: 176: The Art of Visualization
description:
One of the most powerful tools we have is the ability to imagine and visualize. 

Children naturally do this when they're learning rapidly about our vast world. As we "grow up," we stop doing this and rely on what we already know. 

However, the ability to visualize is so important in every aspect of our lives because your mind cannot tell the difference between what's real and vividly imagined.

In this session, I will teach you tools to be able to practice your visualization to shift your perception of what you want to create in your life. 

*** Get instant access to the full 10-day Kwik Start program when you purchase a copy of my new book, Limitless. Get the details on limitlessbook.com  ***
